quote: I just rely on natural talent,"" said Adrian, strolling up to the start of the Dragon's Lair. ""When you have such a wealth of it to draw from, the danger comes from having too much.
quote_letters: I JUST RELY ON NATURAL TALENT SAID ADRIAN STROLLING UP TO THE START OF THE DRAGONS LAIR WHEN YOU HAVE SUCH A WEALTH OF IT TO DRAW FROM THE DANGER COMES FROM HAVING TOO MUCH
